source_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LH_AX_CANADA.fullload.CUSTINVOICEJOUR t WHERE t.dpcreateddatetime = t.dpmodifieddatetime AND t.DPCreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(dpcreateddatetime) FROM LH_AX_CANADA.fullload.CUSTINVOICEJOUR)
target_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LH_Finance.dbo.CUSTINVOICEJOUR t WHERE t.dpcreateddatetime = t.dpmodifieddatetime AND t.lhname = 'LH_AX_CANADA' AND t.DPCreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(dpcreateddatetime) FROM LH_Finance.dbo.CUSTINVOICEJOUR WHERE lhname='LH_AX_CANADA')
